Package com.ooad.hw2.engine

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
com.ooad.hw2.engine.Sprite
com.ooad.hw2.engine.Collidable
com.ooad.hw2.engine.Enemy
public class Enemy extends Collidable
Enemy class is an implementation product for the abstract factory. its components should be created with CharacterComponent factory which given by parameter within its constructor.
